titles.title: A joint resolution directing the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in Ukraine that have not been authorized by Congress.
A joint resolution directing the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in Ukraine that have not been authorized by Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This joint resolution directs the President to remove U.S. Armed Forces from hostilities in or affecting Ukraine within 30 days of this resolution's adoption unless a declaration of war or specific authorization for such use of the Armed Forces has been enacted.
